'''''Vinyar Tengwar 22''''' is the twenty-second issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|21|23}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Fingolfin's Ride" — Tom Loback
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Elityellë''" (column) — Eli Bar-Yahalom
* "Words and Devices: Still at Large There Were Giants, Part 2" (column) — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter.
* "''Essitalmar'': Open Sesame!" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: ''Runot suomentanut Panu Pekkanen''" (column) — Arden R. Smith
